alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 8:25PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gilchrist, Nassau, Bradford, Alachua, Baker, Union, southern Columbia, western Duval, Camden and southeastern Charlton Counties through 900 PM EST... At 825 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 6 miles east of Waverly to near St. George. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, St. Marys, Kingsland, Starke, Hilliard, Trenton, Lake Butler, Woodbine, Callahan and Bell. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
